name: Kuriboh
desc: During your opponent's turn, at damage calculation: You can discard this card; you take no battle damage from that battle (this is a Quick Effect).

name: Dark Magician
desc: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

name: Summoned Skull
desc: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

name: Gaia The Fierce Knight
desc: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.

name: Curse of Dragon
desc: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.

name: Black Luster Soldier
desc: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Black Luster Ritual".

name: Celtic Guardian
desc: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.

name: Giant Soldier of Stone
desc: A giant warrior made of stone. A punch from this creature has earth-shaking results.

name: Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress 2
desc: This monster's wings are capable of generating tornadoes.

name: Feral Imp
desc: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy.

name: Horn Imp
desc: A small fiend that dwells in the dark, its single horn makes it a formidable opponent.

name: Beaver Warrior
desc: What this creature lacks in size it makes up for in defense when battling in the prairie.

name: Griffore
desc: This monster's tough hide deflects almost any attack.

name: Silver Fang
desc: A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle.

name: Mammoth Graveyard
desc: A mammoth that protects the graves of its pack and is absolutely merciless when facing grave-robbers.

name: Torike
desc: Although a poor defender, this monster's sharp horn gives it an edge when attacking.

name: Catapult Turtle
desc: Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster; inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the Tributed monster's ATK on the field.

name: Mystical Elf
desc: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

name: Black Luster Ritual
desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Black Luster Soldier". You must also Tribute monsters from the field or your hand whose total Levels equal 8 or more.

name: Black Magic Ritual
desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Magician of Black Chaos". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 8 or more.

name: Book of Secret Arts
desc: A Spellcaster-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

name: Brain Control
desc: Pay 800 Life Points. Select 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. Take control of it until the End Phase.

name: Burning Land
desc: Destroy all Field Spell Cards on the field. Inflict 500 points of damage to each player's Life Points during his/her Standby Phases.

name: De-Spell
desc: Select 1 Spell Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Spell Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Trap Card, return it to its original position.

name: Detonate
desc: Destroy all face-up "Kuriboh" and "Kuriboh Tokens" you control, along with a number of cards your opponent controls, up to the number of "Kuriboh" and "Kuriboh Tokens" destroyed by this effect.

name: Horn of the Unicorn
desc: The equipped monster gains 700 ATK and DEF. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Return it to the top of the Deck.

name: Makiu, the Magical Mist
desc: Select 1 "Summoned Skull" or Thunder-Type monster you control. Destroy all monsters your opponent controls whose DEF is lower than the ATK of the selected monster. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

name: Monster Reborn
desc: Target 1 monster in either player's Graveyard; Special Summon it.

name: Monster Recovery
desc: Unite 1 of your own monsters on your side of the field and your hand with your Deck and then shuffle it. Draw the same number of cards that were in your hand from the Deck. (You cannot activate this card if you have your opponent's card in your hand.)

name: Multiply
desc: Tribute 1 face-up "Kuriboh". Special Summon as many "Kuriboh Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 300/DEF 200) as possible in Defense Position. These Tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

name: Mystic Box
desc: Target 1 monster your opponent controls and 1 monster you control; destroy the first target, then give control of the second target to your opponent.

name: Polymerization
desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials.

name: Spell Shattering Arrow
desc: Destroy all face-up Spell Cards your opponent controls. For each destroyed Spell Card, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

name: Swords of Revealing Light
desc: Flip all monsters your opponent controls face-up. This card remains on the field for 3 of your opponent's turns. While this card is face-up on the field, monsters your opponent controls cannot declare an attack.

name: Magical Hats
desc: Activate only during your opponent's Battle Phase. Select 2 non-Monster Cards from your Deck and 1 monster you control. Shuffle those 3 cards and Set them on the field in face-down Defense Position. The 2 cards selected from your Deck are treated as monsters (ATK 0/DEF 0) and are destroyed at the end of the Battle Phase.

name: Mirror Force
desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

name: Shift
desc: When your opponent targets exactly 1 monster you control (and no other cards) for an attack, or with a Spell/Trap effect: Target another monster you control that would be an appropriate target; that attack/Spell/Trap now targets the new target.

name: Spellbinding Circle
desc: Select 1 monster. It cannot attack or change its Battle position. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

name: Gaia the Dragon Champion
desc: "Gaia the Fierce Knight" + "Curse of Dragon"

name: Exodia the Forbidden One
desc: When you have "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One", and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" in addition to this card in your hand, you win the Duel.

name: Left Arm of the Forbidden One
desc: A forbidden left arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

name: Right Arm of the Forbidden One
desc: A forbidden right arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

name: Right Leg of the Forbidden One
desc: A forbidden right leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

name: Left Leg of the Forbidden One
desc: A forbidden left leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

name: Magician of Black Chaos
desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Black Magic Ritual".
